Text: Wow, up for 4 years and no comments. Thanks man.
Thanks.  I still have my hardbacks from the original series.
thanks, cannot wait to read them

Thank you! 

I had the first book, but lost it many years ago... time to restart this awesome collection!

:)

Brilliant, thanks. I've got the hard copies but want to be able to read them on the Kindle as well. :)

The first two series have multiple formats, and a couple of them have covers. The first book of the final series is included but only in text format. Nice compilation though.

Thanks a lot!

Keep in mind this was uploaded in 2005 long before epub/mobi was popular. =)

There are websites that can do html/txt to epub/mobi however for free, and of course nook/kindle can read pdf already.
Brilliant dude, now if only I could find this in audio-book format !
Thanks for sharing this. I truly appreciate it
